description: Used to disable the backup job for an item within a container. This is an asynchronous operation. To learn the status of the request, call the GetItemOperationResult API.

vault_name.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

fabric_name.description: The fabric name associated with the backup item.

container_name.description: The container name associated with the backup item.

protected_item_name.description: The backup item to be deleted.

sourceresourceid.description: The ID of the resource to be backed up.

lastrecoverypoint.description: The timestamp when the most recent backup copy was created for this backup item.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

backupmanagementtype.description: The backup management type associated with the backup item.

workloadtype.description: The workload type for this item.

policyid.description: The ID of the backup policy associated with this backup item.
